alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Showers with torrential rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Iron, west central Marquette and southeastern Baraga Counties through 945 PM EDT/845 PM CDT/... At 913 PM EDT/813 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking showers from near Champion to south of Three Lakes, or 13 miles west of Ishpeming, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall may lead to localized flooding and ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Michigamme, Champion, Lake Michigamme, Three Lakes, West Ishpeming, Republic, Humboldt, Diorite, Van Riper State Park and Bone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
